## scripthost-browser package

Sandboxed and observable Javascript host that runs inside an iframe element

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BrowserSandbox](./scripthost-browser.browsersandbox.md) | A script host brigde that runs code inside an IFRAME element |
